item.title: Verify vararg methods using Mockito
item.description: Building tests is one of the most routine tasks for a developer and normally, with frameworks like jUnit and Mockito, this task tends to be carried out without great difficulties. Despite this, there are certain validations, which tend to be more complex, such as checking calls to methods with parameters of type varargs. If you don’t know what varargs is, you can roughly say that it is, the “…” used in parameter declarations in methods, however, I recommend reading this article for better understanding and viewing examples.
